userPermission.location: We need your permission to access your location while using the app to propose you nearby activities and let you use your current location to create new activities.
userPermission.photo: The app accesses your photos to help you build a personalized profile.

auth.resetPasswordMessage: If your email is right, you will receive an email. Don't forget to check your spam folder !
auth.verifyEmail: Check your email (and your SPAM) to confirm your registration.

profileScreen.blockAlertBody:
Are you sure you want to block this user ? 
You will still see activities created by them but they will not be able to chat with you or join your activites.

cgu.title: Terms and Conditions
cgu.p1: The present General Conditions of Use (the GCU) apply to the use of the mobile application Pelops developed by Pelops Sport Sàrl, which allows users to meet to play sport together. The Application uses the services of Google Maps and the geolocation of the users to provide its services.
cgu.sub2: 2. Acceptance of the Terms and Conditions
cgu.p2: By downloading and using the Application, you agree to these CGU, as well as to our Privacy Policy, which governs the collection and use of your personal data.
cgu.p3: The Application is intended to be used by persons over the age of 16 who want to meet other users to play sports. You are responsible for your use of the Application and you agree not to use it for any purposes that are illegal or contrary to these CGU.
cgu.p4: You acknowledge that the use of the Application involves participation in physical activities. You are solely responsible for your own health and safety while engaging in such activities. The Company will not be responsible for any injury, illness, physical or property damage, or any other inconveniences resulting from your use of the Application and participation in the activities offered by you or other users. By using the Application, you agree not to hold the Company liable for any claim, action, liability, loss, damage or expense arising out of your use of the Application and your participation in the activities offered by you or other users.
cgu.p5: We collect personal data such as your username, email, sports preferences in order to provide the services of the Application. We will not share this data with third parties unless it is necessary to provide the services of the Application or if the law requires us to do so.
cgu.p6: The Application uses users' geolocation to help you find nearby sports activities. We will not store or share this data with third parties except if it is necessary to provide the services of the App or if the law requires us to do so.
cgu.p7: The Application and all of its contents, including source code, images, texts, graphics, logos and trademarks, are the exclusive property of the Company. You may not use, reproduce or distribute the content of the Application without our prior written permission.
cgu.sub8: 8. Changes to the Application and the CGU
cgu.p8: We reserve the right to modify or discontinue the Application at any time, as well as these CGU. We encourage you to review the CGU regularly for any changes. Your continue use of the Application following the posting of changes to the CGU will mean that you accept the new CGU.
cgu.p9:
These CGU are governed by Swiss law. Any dispute arising from the use of the Application shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the Swiss courts.
If you have any questions or concerns regarding these CGU, please contact us at pelops.ch@gmail.com
